description:
GoodShort: a must-have app for original dramas and movies

To enjoy original short dramas and movies of a minute or so, anytime, anywhere, whether in travel, at home, or at a restaurant

We have a myriad of short dramas and movies adapted from novels with high quality, high definition, and high update frequency, guaranteeing a different screen experience for you.

[Diverse, all-inclusive content]
There are a lot of short dramas and reels adapted from novels, definitely something fascinating to you. From modern romance, urban romance, and youth romance to live-in sons-in-law, magic doctors, CEOs, billionaires, queens, and gods of war, all your favorite genres and themes can be found here!

[A personalized list of works you may like]
The excellent recommendation system will help you find the best originals, short dramas, and short movies adapted from the hottest novels, meeting the preferences of all kinds of drama and movie lovers!

[A user-friendly, elegant interface]
The simple, clear, user-friendly interface is an ergonomic fit for your eyes.

[Smooth experience]
Smooth streaming, as well as the comfortable interface design, will give you unparalleled viewing enjoyment. The high-quality content output provides a rich, high-definition, smooth, and flawless screen experience.

[Unlimited resources, super fast updates]
The selected, diversified content will satisfy your viewing needs for different content. Subscribe to your favorite works to keep up with the latest updates of your favorite dramas.

Whether you want to relax or pass the time while waiting, GoodShort is the best choice for you. Download it and start exploring!

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!

Turn your livestream into an interactive experience. Bring friends and viewers directly into your stream with real-time discussion, polls, games, and more—then broadcast everywhere at once. Oh, and we have live sports!

■ INTERACTIVE & COLLABORATIVE

Stream WITH your audience, not AT them. A Playback stream is a real-time, interactive space unlike any other platform. Incorporate your viewers in the stream with polls, emoji reactions, live Q&A, and interactive features that engage your community and enhance your content.

■ LIVE SPORTS WATCH PARTIES

Watch live sports together, like magic. Stream live broadcasts from top leagues and platforms including the NBA, MLB, and FanCode, react in the moment, and host watch parties with zero delay and zero spoilers.

■ CREATOR STUDIO

Playback is your mobile production studio. Create professional-quality layouts, invite guests, download clips, and multicast to other platforms with ease – all from your phone. Publish VODs instantly or download to edit and share.

■ STREAM FROM ANYWHERE

Stream IRL from anywhere without external hardware or software. Easily hand off between phone and desktop without missing a beat. Ditch the backpack!

■ MONETIZATION

Whether streaming as a side hustle or a full-time job, Playback helps maximize your earning potential. With Power Chats and Room Subscriptions, creators can turn community loyalty into revenue and reward dedicated fans with exclusive content and perks. And multicasting allows you to multiply your earnings across all platforms.

■ DISCOVERY

The home feed rewards quality and consistency, helping great content find an audience and dedicated creators grow. Playback is invested in creators’ success - stay connected and tag @watchplayback with clips for a boost!

[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Akinator can read your mind and tell you what character you are thinking of, just by asking a few questions. Think of a real or fictional character and Akinator will try to guess who it is. 
Will you dare challenge the genie? And what about other themes like movies, animals…?

###NEW###
EXTEND YOUR AKINATOR EXPERIENCE WITH A USER ACCOUNT! 
Akinator lets you to create your own user account. It will record the Aki Awards you've won, the accessories you've unlocked and your Genizs' balance. They will follow you everywhere now, even if you change your mobile device. 

3 ADDITIONAL THEMES BESIDES THE CHARACTERS
Akinator is getting stronger and stronger... The genie has increased his knowledge, and now you have the opportunity to also challenge him on movies, animals and objects!
Will you manage to defeat Akinator?

GO IN SEARCH FOR AKI AWARDS
Akinator invites you to think outside the box. As you know, he likes to guess characters and to take on difficult challenges. To do that, make him guess forgotten characters who have not been played for a very long time and you may win the best Aki Awards.

BE THE BEST PLAYER
Challenge the other players on the leaderboards to prove who the best is. You may write your name on the Last Super Awards board or on the Hall of Fame. 

KEEP ON GUESSING
Each day, try to find the 5 mysterious characters and win some additional and specific Aki Awards. Complete the full Daily Challenge and earn the Gold Daily Challenge Aki Award, one of the most prestigious Aki Awards.

UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY
Using Geniz, you can unlock and play with new backgrounds and customize your genie to your liking. The genie will turn into a vampire, a cowboy or a disco man. Unleash your creativity by mixing 12 hats and 13 clothes to create your ideal combination.

PLAY MORE, WITHOUT ANY LIMITS!
THE ULTIMATE POTION unlocks all characters and removes all ads from the app, to ensure you get the best gaming experience.

Main features:
-17 languages (French, English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Japanese, Arabic, Russian, Italian, Chinese, Turkish, Korean, Hebrew, Polish, Indonesian, Vietnamese and Dutch)
-Get 3 additional themes: Movies, Animals and Objects
-Aki Awards Board to get an overview of your collection
-Hall of Fame with both current and previous ranking
-Last super awards for Black, Platinum and Gold Aki Awards
-Daily Challenges Board
-Add magic by proposing a photo or some questions
-Customize your genie by combining different hats and clothes
-The sensitive content filter
-Video recording feature in-game

---------------------------
Follow the genie on:
-Facebook @officialakinator
-Twitter @akinator_team
-Instagram @akinatorgenieapp
---------------------------

Genie’s tips:
-Akinator requires an Internet connection to use his magic lamp. Turn on Wifi or be sure to have a data plan.
-Don’t forget to scroll down the list to find and select your language

description:
Private Video Saver offers a unique browsing experience beyond the basics. From QR code site access to AI-powered content summaries, it keeps your discoveries secure with passcode protection and automatically clears all traces, such as history, cookies, and cache, after every session! It also features a built-in video editor supporting video reverse, convert video, adjust volume, adjust speed, and flip & rotate, along with a convenient bookmark function for saving your favorite sites!


Features of Video Saver:

Video Editor
	• A built-in studio at your fingertips: convert video, reverse playback, adjust volume, change speed, and flip & rotate with ease.
Private Saver
	• Hidden behind an unbreakable vault, your private content stays invisible to anyone but you.
Quick QR Scan Access
	• Instantly unlock any website by scanning a QR code or url: fast, safe, seamless, and hassle-free.
Photo Identifier & Search
	• Turn every photo into unlimited power: identify, decode, and search the world in seconds.
AI Summarize
	• Quickly extract online article summaries, AI-powered insights in seconds.
Auto-Clear on Exit
	• Vanish without a trace: every session erases itself the moment you leave.
Bookmark Manager
	• Save, organize, and revisit your favorite sites anytime with a simple tap.

ברוכים הבאים ל+12, אפליקציית הסטרימינג החדשה של קשת 12 - עם כל התוכניות והכוכבים הכי אהובים בישראל. הורידו את +12 לטלוויזיה, לסמארטפון ולטאבלט ותיהנו מהדרך המתקדמת והנוחה ביותר לצפות בשידור החי של ערוץ 12, בספריית VOD  עם כל התוכניות והסדרות מכל הזמנים ומכל העונות, מאחורי הקלעים וקטעים בלעדיים מעשורים רבים של יצירה מעולה.
ב+12 תוכלו למצוא את התוכניות החשובות והנצפות ביותר בישראל כמו החדשות, חתונה ממבט ראשון, הכוכב הבא, נינג'ה ישראל, להיות איתה, מאסטר שף, רוקדים עם כוכבים, השוטרים, סבר מרנן, צומת מילר ועוד.
האפליקציה אופיינה, עוצבה ופותחה בלעדית ע"י צוותי הטכנולוגיה ב-mako והיא מתייצבת בשורה הראשונה של אפליקציות הסטרימינג בעולם. היא מיועדת לכל צופי ערוץ 12 שמעוניינים לצפות בתכנים בממשק נוח, באיכות גבוהה ובחינם.
האפליקציה מאפשרת חווית צפייה מהפכנית בטלוויזיות החכמות, במובייל ובטאבלט ומציעה לכם את כל ספריית התכנים של קשת 12 וחדשות 12.
הורידו עכשיו את האפליקציה ותיהנו מצפייה בתוכניות המובילות של הטלוויזיה של ישראל. פלוס.
אז מה הפלוס בחוויה של +12?
• שידורי לייב – קשת 12, הטלוויזיה של ישראל, בממשק צפייה מתקדם, מהיר וחדשני כמו שמגיע לכם.
• פיצ'רים מתקדמים של Catch-Up ו- StartOver – איחרתם? פספסתם? אל תדאגו, אנחנו כאן בשבילכם עם פיצ'רים מתקדמים שישדרגו לכם את הצפייה.
• שירותי VOD נרחבים - אספנו, ערכנו ושיפרנו את איכות הצפייה של מאות תכני קשת 12 מכל השנים. בואו לצפות בתוכניות האהובות עליכם ובכוכבים הגדולים עכשיו ובעבר.
• תוכן ייעודי – יצרנו עבורכם קטעים קצרים, מאחורי הקלעים, פספוסים ועוד שלל תוכן משלים לתכנים האהובים ביותר.
מנויי makoTV: המנוי פעיל גם ב+12. המנוי יתחדש מדי חודש עד שיבוטל על ידי המשתמש. ביטול מנוי במהלך מחזור חיוב לא יזכה בהחזר עבור החלק היחסי של אותו מחזור חיוב. יובהר, כי ניתן להמשיך לצפות בתכנים בהתאם למנוי שנרכש עד לתום החודש האחרון שעליו שולמו דמי המנוי. ניתן לבטל מנוי אשר משולם דרך חנות האפליקציות בכל עת בהגדרות החשבון האישי.

Welcome to 12+, Keshet12's new streaming app, with all of Israel's most popular shows and stars. Download 12+ to your TV, smartphone, and tablet and enjoy the most advanced and convenient way to watch Keshet12's live broadcast and VOD back catalogue, with decades of excellent series as well as exclusive behind-the-scenes and additional content.

On 12+ you'll find Israel's foremost television series, including news programs, Married at First Sight, Rising Star, Ninja Israel, Lehiyot Ita, Master Chef, Dancing with the Stars, The Cops, Sabri Maranan, Tzomet Miller and many more. 

The app was developed and designed exclusively by Mako's technological team and stands at the forefront of global streaming; it is designed for all Keshet12 viewers interested in an accessible interface for high-quality free streaming. 
Download the app now to enjoy Israel's favorite shows, plus.
So what's the plus side of the 12+ experience?
•	Live broadcasting – Israel's television, brought to you with the advanced, quick, innovative viewing interface you deserve!
•	Advanced Catch-Up and Start-Over features – Coming in late? Don't worry – we're here for you, with easy-to-use features to upgrade your viewing experience!
•	Wide-ranging VOD service – We've curated, edited and improved the viewing quality of hundreds of hours of Keshet12 content from throughout the years. Come watch your favorite shows and the greatest stars of today and yesterday.
•	Exclusive content – We've created snippets, behind-the-scenes content, bloopers and loads of supplementary content for your favorite Keshet12 properties.

description:
לקוחות yes? הכירו את אפליקציית yes+ לניידים ולטאבלטים. התכנים האהובים של yes עכשיו בחוויית צפייה חדשנית גם בנייד!

מה מחכה לכם באפליקציה? 

פרופילים אישיים: אזור אישי לכל אחד מבני הבית, שמתאים בדיוק לחוויית הצפייה שהוא אוהב - עם המשך צפייה, ערוצים מועדפים ורשימות צפייה אישיות, ובקיצור - כל מה שמעניין אתכם באמת, במקום שהוא אך ורק שלכם.  

הורדת פרקים ישירות למכשיר: אין אינטרנט? אין בעיה. מורידים את התכנים שאוהבים ישירות למכשיר, וצופים בנסיעות ארוכות, בחו״ל ובכל מקום ללא חיבור זמין לרשת  

הפקות מקור איכותיות: תכני originals בלעדיים של yes עם הצצות למאחורי הקלעים, ראיונות עם כוכבים, קטעים מיוחדים ועוד  

עולם ה-tweens: עולם שווה במיוחד לילדים הגדולים של yes, עם הסדרות הכי טובות, המלצות מכוכבים אהובים וגישה נוחה גם לערוצים ולתוכניות באזור המבוגרים  

עולם ה-kids: עולם הקטנטנים של yes עם המון דמויות אהובות, שירים ואוספים מיוחדים, בממשק בטוח ומותאם לילדים הכולל טיימר להגבלת הצפייה, חסימת תכנים ועוד  

לוח שידורים מתקדם: פאנל חדשני ונוח במיוחד, שיאפשר לכם לדלג בקלות בין ערוצים, לצפות בפרקים מהשבוע שעבר ולהתעדכן מה ישודר בשבוע הבא  

וכמובן, כל הפיצ׳רים הנוחים מהטלוויזיה: בינג׳, StartOver ו-CatchUp לחוויית צפייה נוחה ומשלימה, בדיוק כמו שרגילים מהמסך הגדול

ניפגש באפליקציה,
צוות yes+

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

هل تحتار في اختيار فيلم أو مسلسل لمشاهدته الليلة؟ دع عجلة الساحرة تختار لك! تطبيق متكامل يجمع بين تتبع الأفلام والمسلسلات مع لمسة رومانسية فريدة.


المميزات الرئيسية:

عجلة السحرية


دوّر العجلة واترك الحظ يختار دراما الليلة

رسوم متحركة ساحرة ومؤثرات احتفالية

اختيار ذكي من قائمتك المفضلة


مكتبة شاملة للأفلام والمسلسلات


تصفح آلاف الأفلام والمسلسلات

معلومات مفصلة مع التقييمات والمراجعات

تصنيفات متنوعة: رائجة، شعبية، الأعلى تقييماً

بحث سريع ودقيق


تنظيم مثالي لقوائمك


قائمة المفضلة لأجمل ما شاهدت

قائمة المشاهدة لما تنوي مشاهدته

تتبع ما شاهدته بالفعل

إحصائيات شخصية مفصلة


اختبار المعرفة السينمائية


اختبر معرفتك بعالم السينما والدراما

أسئلة متنوعة وممتعة

تحديات يومية ونقاط تنافسية

شارك نتائجك مع أصدقائك



واجهة داكنة أنيقة وعصرية

ألوان حمراء دافئة تعكس

تجربة مستخدم سلسة وممتعة

دعم كامل للغة العربية


تحديثات مستمرة


محتوى محدث يومياً

أحدث الإصدارات السينمائية

تنبيهات للحلقات الجديدة


لماذا عجلة؟

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

حمّل التطبيق الآن وابدأ رحلتك في عالم السينمائي!

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

أبرز المزايا:
استكشاف المحتوى بسهولة: تصفّح أحدث الأفلام والمسلسلات العربية، التركية، مسلسلات كورية، والآسيوية، مترجمة ومدبلجة بجودة عالية.

توصيات ذكية: يقدّم لك التطبيق اقتراحات مخصصة تناسب ذوقك بناءً على تفاعلاتك.

تقييمات ومراجعات: اطّلع على آراء المستخدمين، شارك تقييماتك، وتعرّف على أفضل الأعمال.

تصنيفات متنوعة: أكشن، دراما، كوميديا، أنيميشن، عائلي، والكثير من التصنيفات التي تناسب جميع الأذواق.

دليل شامل للمحتوى الرمضاني والعربي: معلومات محدثة حول أبرز مسلسلات رمضان والأعمال الكلاسيكية والمعاصرة.

قائمة مشاهداتي: أنشئ قائمة خاصة بك لتتبع ما شاهدته وما ترغب بمشاهدته لاحقًا.

تنويه هام:

تطبيق موقع قصة عشق مخصص لاستعراض وتصفح معلومات الأفلام والمسلسلات فقط. وجميع الحقوق محفوظة لأصحابها الأصليين.
تم تصميم التطبيق بهدف تقديم معلومات محدثة وشاملة حول الأعمال السينمائية والتلفزيونية الجديدة والكلاسيكية من مصادر متنوعة وموثوقة.


SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION:

- Title: عجلة تتبع دراما Premium

- Length: Weekly ($3.99), Monthly ($5.99), or

Lifetime ($9.99)

- Content: Unlimited access to all premium features including ad-free experience, unlimited lives, double points, exclusive themes, and advanced statistics

- Auto-renewable subscription

- Payment charged to iTunes Account at confirmation

- Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled 24+ hours before period ends

- Manage subscriptions in Account Settings

Want to meet exciting new people and spark real conversations?

Introducing Aveola — the next-generation social video chat experience that helps you connect, express yourself, and build meaningful connections from anywhere in the world.

With Aveola, you can enjoy safe 1:1 conversations, share your moments, grow your friends, and stay in touch with people who match your vibe. Whether you're looking for a lighthearted talk or deep conversation, Aveola brings you a vibrant global community — all in one secure, trusted, and safety-first app.

Key Features

- Live Video Chats  
Have face-to-face conversations with new people and old friends alike — always with your privacy protected. Every chat starts with a blurred screen, and video becomes visible only when both users agree to connect. Aveola is built around your safety: AI moderation technology works live to detect and prevent inappropriate behaviour. All users must follow our strict community guidelines. If someone behaves inappropriately, you can instantly block or report them — and our safety team will take immediate action.

- Beauty Filters & Masks  
Enhance your video chats with real-time beauty filters and fun masks, making your experience more playful and personalised.

- Auto-Translation  
Break language barriers and chat naturally — your messages are automatically translated in real time based on your preferred language.

- Unlimited Text Chat  
Stay connected with unlimited messages. Share ideas, laughs, photos, or just keep it casual — it's your space.

- Smart Matching  
Discover people based on activity and interest. Build your social circle with authentic interactions, not algorithms.

Rich Social Ecosystem

Aveola goes far beyond video chat. It's a place to express yourself, grow a following, and engage with a real community.

- Stories Feed  
Share your moments and stay updated with posts from people you follow.

- Top Profiles  
Discover trusted, active users and grow your presence in the community.

- Level System  
Climb the ranks and show off your popularity. Your level reflects your activity, engagement, and social presence on the platform.  
Verified badges are only awarded to users who frequently participate in video chats and follow our community standards without violations.

- Reward System  
Get rewarded for being active, sending gifts, chatting, and more. Earn status and stand out as a valued member of the community.

- Profile Customisation & Gifts  
Personalise your profile, send and receive collectible gifts, and express yourself your way.

Privacy & Safety First

Aveola is designed to be safe, respectful, and inclusive. With built-in tools for moderation, privacy, and user control, we ensure a positive experience for everyone. All users must agree to our terms and community guidelines.

Please note: Aveola is available to users 18 years and older. All members must agree to our community guidelines, which strictly prohibit nudity, explicit content, bullying, hate speech, harassment, and other behaviour that creates an unsafe or disrespectful environment, etc. Violations may result in temporary or permanent removal from the platform.

Download Aveola and step into a world of real-time connections, creative expression, and social discovery — all just a tap away.

Privacy Policy: https://www.aveola.app/privacy-policy  
Terms of Use: https://www.aveola.app/terms-of-service

Loppi is your laid-back gaming corner — a place to unwind with easy games and capture the joy
of simple play. Whether you’ve got a few minutes or just need a break, Loppi makes it easy to
jump into fun rounds and enjoy quick, casual play.

- Play Anytime, Anywhere
Join or host lighthearted matches like Tic Tac Toe and Rock Paper Scissors. It’s all about tapping
into fun, wherever you are.

- Simple to Learn, Fun to Master
Classic games with a fresh twist — easy to start, hard to stop. Just a tap and you’re in.

- Celebrate Game Moments
Highlight your favorite rounds and save memorable plays. Capture joyful, spontaneous moments
in your own way.

- Invite Others to Play
Send a playful game invite with a tap. It’s casual, optional, and focused purely on fun — no profiles
or matching involved.

-Your Game Journal
See your gameplay history in one place. It’s your own lighthearted log of fun sessions and mini
victories.

Loppi is made for casual entertainment — where light games turn into real smiles. Download now
and enjoy your next joyful break.

Inspire your children to uncover their unique interests
Help your children explore video content that they love and that parents trust, in an app made just for children. With easy navigation tools and a suite of features, you can help your children spend time online uncovering new interests, unleashing their imagination and building their confidence in their own unique world.

Help your children grow at their own pace
Your children are unique, so they should only see content that they're ready to explore. Decide what videos will help them make the most of their time online, then personalise individual profiles using custom content filters as they grow.

– Help your youngest children learn their ABCs, nurture their curiosity and more in 'Preschool' mode.
– Expand your children's interests to songs, cartoons or DIY crafts in 'Younger' mode.
– Give your older children the freedom to search popular music and gaming videos in 'Older' mode.
– Or, hand-pick the videos, channels and collections that your children can see in 'Approved content only' mode.

Rewatch videos and bond over favourites
Quickly find your children's favourite videos and the content that you've shared with them in the 'Watch it again' tab.

Shape your children's viewing experience with parental controls
Parental control features help you limit what your children watch, and better guide their viewing experience. Our blocking process aims to help keep videos on YouTube Kids family-friendly and safe – but each family's preferences are unique. Don't like a video or channel, or see inappropriate content? Flag it for our team to review.

Set a screen-time limit
Encourage your children to take a break in between exploring content. Use the 'Timer' feature to freeze the app when screen time is up so that your children can apply their new skills to the real world.

See important information
– Parental setup is needed to ensure the best experience for your family.
– Children may see commercial content from YouTube creators that are not paid ads.
– See the Privacy Notice for Google Accounts managed with Family Link for information on our privacy practices for signing in with a Google Account.
– If your children use the app without signing in with their Google Account, the YouTube Kids Privacy Notice applies.

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.
